replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
VSdd 发表于 2020-5-31 21:39
我填Green没用Creepers are their bright green color because Notch tried to make them well camouflaged for the original classic Minecraft textures, which were bright shades of green. In multiplayer, if a creeper is attacked by another player, and the other player runs out of sight, it does not attack any other players.

那就尝试把所有相近颜色填一遍？

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:

应该填green吧
